TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract Model3D extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable

remarks.format:
## Remarks Objects of this type include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> class to render Model3D objects. You can compose Model3D objects by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup> to form a single model. You can share Model3D objects among <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> objects to make multiple instances in a scene.
## Examples [!code-xml[animate3drotation#Animate3DRotation3DN3](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/Animate3DRotation.BlankSample/Window1.xaml#animate3drotation3dn3)]

Docs.summary: Gets a that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this .
Docs.value: A bounding box for the model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , and makes deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied; however, their current values are copied.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance string System.IFormattable.ToString(string format, class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.param:
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.

The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
Docs.summary: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
Docs.returns: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
